mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from (select rownum rnum, place.* from (select * from place order by place_id asc) place) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 9
select * from (select rownum rnum, food.* from (select * from food order by food_id asc) food) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 12
select * from (select rownum rnum, room.* from (select * from room order by room_id asc) room) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 8

select count(*) from (select place_name from place where place_name like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or place_addr like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' union select food_name from food where food_name like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or food_addr like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' union select room_name from room where room_name like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or room_addr like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' )

select * from ( select rownum rnum, search.* from (select place_name, place_photo, place_addr, place_type from place where place_name like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or place_addr like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' union select food_name, food_photo, food_addr, food_type from food where food_name like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or food_addr like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' union select room_name, room_photo, room_addr, room_type from room where room_name like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or room_addr like '%' || #{input, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' ) search ) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 5+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 5) ORDER BY dbms_random.value
